The China Study: The Most Comprehensive Studies of Nutrition Ever Conducted and the Startling Implications for Diet, Weight Loss na Long-term Health bụ akwụkwọ nke onye odee akwukwo bu T
Colin Campbell na nwa ya nwoke bù Thomas M
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-arụ ụka maka uru ọgwụgwọ nke nri zuru oke

E bipụtara ya na mbụ na United Steeti n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2005 ma ree ihe karịrị otu nde ka ọ dị ugbu a site n'onwq Oktoba  2013, nke mere ka o bụrụ otu n'ime akwụkwọ ndị Amerika kacha ere ahịa gbasara nri.
